title: "Oy, This is Trundle..."
body:
"... Yeah, Vi. 'Member that thing you want'd to do? Well, we took care of it." - Trundle

"Oy, Trundle. How's muy mustache?" - Volibear

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Y0IaO5dv_KY/VGrjohKzaVI/AAAAAAAAdik/wo1Y4LZC5a4/s1600/Trundle_Splash_4.jpg

replies.body: Bear with mustache is too much manliness.

> Bear with mustache is too much manliness.

Its....
http://falkvinge.net/files/2013/01/Dr_Evil-646x363.jpg

Unbearable
Add Braum in there and it would definitely be too manly.
If I had Photoshop, this would happen in an instant.
They just need to get Trundle's elbow out of Voli's loading screen. That's all.
No, they need to get Voli off of trundle's elbow.

> No, they need to get Voli off of trundle's elbow.

One does not simply obscure the view of a polar bear with a mustache.
My thought exactly. They removed Eve's legs from Twitch' loading screen, I hope Voli's loading screen is a WIP and will be corrected ^^

this is an awesome piece... but why are officers of the law, aka the protectors of the peace, aka the good guys, etc walking **away** from an explosion? shouldn't they be going to make sure no one was hurt? and no, it's not okay for them to have purposefully blown someone up. and if it's just a controlled demolition, then the splash just got really lame

edit: from the arrest and almost immediate escape of their culprits, I believe my question is answered...

> this is an awesome piece... but why are officers of the law, aka the protectors of the peace, aka the good guys, etc walking **away** from an explosion? shouldn't they be going to make sure no one was hurt? and no, it's not okay for them to have purposefully blown someone up. and if it's just a controlled demolition, then the splash just got really lame

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sqz5dbs5zmo

Unless they blowin up da bad guys.
Then everything's okay :D
It's Runeterra, where anything shall happen at any given time.

Trundles tie in this splash bothers me... His in-game model has a white tie similar to volibear's white tie, but the splash shows trundle having a black tie.... I would love them forever if Riot would fix this <3
If this was a buddy-cop drama I would watch the hell out of it.
my reaction
Would've fit real Trundle better.
SO MUCH BADASS!!
So manly
Detritus and Angua?
A troll and a flippy bear, Great
MUST BUY SKIN! (voli)
Oh my god. {{summoner:2}}
Bad ass.
I liked him more without a mustache

Agreed.  That Voli skin went from 80% chance of buying down to 30% with that mustache.

My dislike of facial hair is strong than my love for Volibear.
You clearly don't love Volibear.

> I liked him more without a mustache

I used too as well. But the mustache completes the cop look, doesn't it? I mean trundle has the stereotypical British facial hair, completing his british cop style. I am guessing Volibear is the american cop with the mustache, like Reno 911 lol.

> I liked him more without a mustache

BULLLLLLLLLLONEY

> I liked him more without a mustache

Me too mate,sigh
